name: puppeteer-req-interceptor
description: Intercept API Requests and return Mocked Data

scripts-info.example: Run the puppeteer.js example which will create hn.pdf in the root directoy.
scripts-info.fix: Try to automatically fix any linting problems
scripts-info.watch: Watch and rebuild the project on save
scripts-info.version: Bump package.json version, update CHANGELOG.md, tag release
scripts-info.reset: Delete all un-tracked files and reset the repo to the last commit
scripts-info.prepare-release: One-step: clean, build, and prep a release
